FUND_YOUR_ACCOUNT.TITLE: Fund Your Account
FUND_YOUR_ACCOUNT.LOGIN_TO_NETBANKING_PAYNOW: Login to Mobile Banking app of a Singapore registered bank and select PayNow.
FUND_YOUR_ACCOUNT.LOGIN_TO_NETBANKING_BANK: Please note that your investment funds must originate from an account in your legal name and a Singapore registered bank. Accounts may be suspended if any suspicious activity is detected.
FUND_YOUR_ACCOUNT.TAKE_SCREENSHOT: Take a Screenshot to do it later
FUND_YOUR_ACCOUNT.ADD_REFERENCE_CODE_INFO: Please indicate this Reference Code in the “Remarks / Descriptions / Comments” of your fund transfer.
FUND_YOUR_ACCOUNT.SETUP_AUTO_DEPOSIT_DESC: Hey, you can save time when you set up auto-deposits through your bank! Find out how in the bank transfer details below.
FUND_YOUR_ACCOUNT.PROCESS_TIME_INFO: Fund your account within 21 days to kickstart your investment!
FUND_YOUR_ACCOUNT.SUCCESSFUL_TOPUP: Your request will be processed within 1 - 2 business days. We will notify you once your portfolio top up has been successful.
FUND_YOUR_ACCOUNT.DESC: Please transfer the following amount using your preferred payment method details:

SHOW_BANK_TRANSCTIONS.LBL_STEP_1: Log in to your internet banking or mobile banking app of a Singapore registered bank.
SHOW_BANK_TRANSCTIONS.LBL_STEP_2: Select an account of your own (registered under your name) to transfer from and enter the amount to transfer.
SHOW_BANK_TRANSCTIONS.LBL_STEP_4: Verify and confirm the transaction details.
SHOW_BANK_TRANSCTIONS.LBL_STEP_5: We will notify you once your funds have been received.
SHOW_BANK_TRANSCTIONS.DESC_SETUP_AUTO_DEPOSIT: For Monthly Investment - Set up a Standing Instruction to automate the transfer of investment funds on a monthly basis.

SHOW_PAYNOW.LBL_STEP_1: Login to Mobile Banking app of a Singapore registered bank and select PayNow.
SHOW_PAYNOW.LBL_STEP_3: Verify and confirm the transaction details.
SHOW_PAYNOW.LBL_STEP_4: We will notify you once your funds have been received.
SHOW_PAYNOW.DESC_SETUP_AUTO_DEPOSIT: For Monthly Investment - Set up a Standing Instruction to automate the transfer of investment funds on a monthly basis.

TOPUP_REQUEST.REQUEST_PROCESSED: Request will be processed once fund transfer is complete

YOUR_INVESTMENT.TITLE: Your Investment
YOUR_INVESTMENT.PROFILE_DEC: Here’s a performance summary of your investments.
YOUR_INVESTMENT.NO_INVESTMENT_YET: Please transfer your money to your account to start investing.
YOUR_INVESTMENT.DELETE_TXT:
Please do not delete if you have already initiated the fund transfer to your investment account, as it will take 1 to 5 working days for changes to be reflected in your investment overview. If you delete, your recommended portfolio will be lost and you will have to start the journey from the beginning.

Are you sure you wish to proceed to delete?
YOUR_INVESTMENT.IN_PROGRESS: Transaction is in Progress and will reflect in 4 to 5 working days
YOUR_INVESTMENT.NO_PORTFOLIO: You do not have any portfolios.

TOTAL_RETURNS.TITLE: Total Returns
TOTAL_RETURNS.MESSAGE: The total returns are calculated by geometrically linking the periodic returns between all your transactions. This return is also known as the time-weighted return.

CASH_ACCOUNT_BALANCE.TITLE: Cash Account
CASH_ACCOUNT_BALANCE.MESSAGE: The cash account is where all your investment funds are held before it is transferred to a portfolio or your bank account.

WITHDRAW.TITLE: Withdrawal
WITHDRAW.WITHDRAW_TYPE_DESC: You may withdraw money from your cash account after transferring funds from your portfolio.

CONFIRM_WITHDRAWAL.TITLE: Confirm Withdrawal
CONFIRM_WITHDRAWAL.DESC_PORTFOLIO_TO_CASH:
You are withdrawing the following amount from your portfolio to your cash account.

Once the request is submitted, it cannot be cancelled.
CONFIRM_WITHDRAWAL.DESC_PORTFOLIO_TO_BANK:
You are withdrawing the following amount from your portfolio to your bank account.

Once the request is submitted, it cannot be cancelled.
CONFIRM_WITHDRAWAL.DESC_CASH_TO_BANK:
You are withdrawing the following amount from your cash account to your bank account.

Once the request is submitted, it cannot be cancelled.
CONFIRM_WITHDRAWAL.GUIDELINE_FOR_PORTFOLIO_MIN: As a guideline, you should maintain a minimum portfolio value of $50. You accept, should your portfolio balance be below that, that we might not re-balance your portfolio to its strategic asset allocation upon re-balancing events.

FORWARD_PRICING_INFO.TITLE: Amount may be different due to price forwarding
FORWARD_PRICING_INFO.DESC: There may be slight difference to the amount you redeem at as the exact price of the funds you transact is not known at the point of placing your order.

FORWARD_PRICING_MODAL.TITLE: Difference in actual withdrawal amount due to price forwarding
FORWARD_PRICING_MODAL.HTML_DESC:
As with most unit trusts, buy and sell orders for the funds making up the portfolio are transacted at end-of-day prices.

The exact price at which you will transact is therefore not known at the point of your placing an order.

The price of the fund that you see on screen is from the previous one or two business days before, depending on the fund, not the actual price at which you will transact.

The actual price at which you will transact will only be known one or two business days later.

For example:

You redeem $100 of the portfolio (T day).

The indicative price of one of the portfolio’s underlying funds, Fund A, is $1 on T day.

Based on this indicative price, you will redeem $100 / $1 = 100 units.

The actual price of the fund at the end of T day is $1.01. This price is only reflected on T+1 day.

You will transact at $1.01 and your redemption proceeds will be $1.01 x 100 = $101.

WITHDRAW_REQUEST_LOADER.TITLE: Submitting Request
WITHDRAW_REQUEST_LOADER.DESC: Please wait while we submit the withdraw request

WITHDRAW.MIN_WITHDRAWAL_INFO: Please note that minimum withdrawal amount is ${{MIN_WITHDRAW_AMOUNT}}.
WITHDRAW.REDEEM_ALL_INFO: Please note that minimum portfolio amount is ${{MIN_BALANCE_AMOUNT}}. If you wish to maintain your portfolio, you are to maintain a minimum portfolio value of ${{MIN_BALANCE_AMOUNT}} or continue to redeem all.

WITHDRAW_SUCCESS.TITLE: Withdrawal Request Submitted
WITHDRAW_SUCCESS.DESC: We will update you on the status of your request within 2 working days.
